About Subscribe

Bop Hour is the public accountability measure for a musical challenge. I'm making 100 songs in Ableton Live this year. My primary goal is to outpace the destructive black hole that is creative preciousness.

Each sketch needs to have a clear emotional identity, be at least 2 minutes, and have no more than 3 primary elements. All tempos genres and atmospheres are on the table.

My name is Josh Brugman. I make music and am fortunate to collaborate with some of my best friends.
